name: Might
description:
Your [Weapon] and [Spell] power is increased by 5.
If you have {effect:weakened:Weakened} when you gain Might, you remove Weakened instead of gaining Might.

name: Regeneration
description: You restore 1 Wound at the end of your turn.

name: Protection
description:
All direct damage you suffer is decreased by 5.
If you have {effect:vulnerability:Vulnerability} when you gain Protection, you remove Vulnerability instead of gaining Protection.

name: Stability
description:
If you are {effect:stunned}, you immediately remove this status. If you are {effect:prone}, you immediately get back on your feet.
You cannot be stunned, knocked prone, pushed, pulled or slid (unless you want to).

name: Vigor
description:
Removes the {effect:crippled:Crippled} and {effect:chilled:Chilled} conditions.
Your Movement Speed and Avoidance are increased by 1, and you have advantage on {power:parry:Parry} and {power:dodge:Dodge} rolls.

name: Resistance
description:
Removes the {effect:burning:Burning} and {effect:bleeding:Bleeding} condition.
Burning and Bleeding conditions cannot be applied to you.
